services.title: Our Web Development & IT Support Services
services.responsiveWebsitesDesc: Modern, mobile-first websites that work perfectly on all devices. We specialize in creating fast, responsive websites that provide excellent user experience and follow web standards.
services.seoOptimizationDesc: Improve your search engine ranking and increase online visibility. Our SEO services help your business better position itself in Google results and attract more qualified traffic.
services.logoDesignDesc: Unique and memorable logos that represent your brand identity. We create professional brand designs that make your business stand out from the competition.
services.customDevelopmentDesc: JavaScript, C#, .NET, React applications tailored to your requirements. We build custom software solutions that solve your specific business challenges.
services.mobileCleanupDesc: Optimize and clean your mobile device for better performance. We help improve speed, storage, and overall user experience of your mobile device.
services.osInstallationDesc: Professional operating system installation and configuration. We ensure your system is properly set up with all necessary drivers and software.
services.pcCleanupDesc: Remove viruses and optimize your computer for peak performance. We provide comprehensive computer maintenance and security services.
services.semMarketingDesc: Advertising through Google Ads and social networks. Increase visibility and conversions through targeted paid advertising.
services.webMarketingDesc: Comprehensive digital marketing strategies. Analysis, planning and implementation of marketing campaigns.
services.accessibilityDesc: Ensure your website is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. WCAG compliance and screen reader optimization.

hero.subtitle: Professional web development and IT services tailored to your needs in Sisak, Croatia. We create responsive websites, optimize for search engines, and provide comprehensive IT solutions.

about.title: About Lemgenda
about.text1: Lemgenda is a comprehensive digital solutions provider based in Sisak, Croatia, founded and operated by Lem Treursić - an experienced Mid-Senior .NET Developer with over 6 years of professional experience at Cenosco. We specialize in transforming businesses through cutting-edge technology and creative digital solutions that drive real results.
about.text2: With extensive experience in developing .NET applications in C#, MS SQL Server, Knockout.js and React.js, we understand that every business has unique challenges and opportunities. Our team combines technical expertise with business understanding gained through work in various industries, ensuring our solutions perfectly align with your business objectives and target audience.
about.customWebDevDesc: We build responsive, mobile-first websites and web applications using modern technologies like React, JavaScript, C# and .NET. Experience in developing .NET backend applications in Visual Studio ensures fast, secure and scalable solutions that provide exceptional user experience.
about.digitalGrowthDesc: Beyond just SEO optimization, we develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies based on experience in market analysis and business strategy adaptation. We increase your online visibility, attract qualified audiences and convert visitors into loyal customers through a data-driven approach.
about.brandIdentityDesc: We create memorable brand identities through professional logo design and comprehensive visual systems. With over 15 years of experience in web design, our designs not only look great but also effectively communicate your brand's values and message to your target audience.
about.completeItDesc: From computer maintenance and virus removal to operating system installations and mobile device optimization, we provide comprehensive IT support to keep your technology running smoothly and securely. Experience in project management and cost control ensures efficient implementation.
about.commitmentText: At Lemgenda, we believe in building long-term partnerships with our clients. We're committed to delivering not just projects, but solutions that grow with your business. Our team stays current with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure you always receive modern, effective solutions.
about.resultsDrivenDesc: Our focus is on achieving measurable results that drive your business forward, based on experience in developing performant and scalable applications.
about.timelyDeliveryDesc: We respect deadlines and ensure your project is completed on time, with careful time and resource management.
about.ongoingSupportDesc: We provide continuous support and maintenance to ensure long-term success, upgrading solutions as technology advances.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take to develop a website?
faq.a1: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project. A simple brochure website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while e-commerce solutions and custom web applications can take 6-12 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline after discussing your specific requirements.
faq.q2: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
faq.a2: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance packages that include security updates, performance monitoring, content updates, and technical support. We believe in building long-term partnerships with our clients.
faq.q3: Can you help with SEO and digital marketing?
faq.a3: Absolutely! We offer complete SEO optimization services, including technical SEO, content strategy, keyword research, and performance tracking. We also provide SEM, social media marketing, and comprehensive digital marketing strategies.
faq.q4: What technologies do you work with?
faq.a4: We work with modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (React, Vue.js), PHP, Python, and various CMS platforms. We choose the best technology stack based on your project requirements, budget, and long-term goals.
faq.q5: Do you offer responsive design for mobile devices?
faq.a5: Yes, all our websites are built with mobile-first responsive design. We ensure your website looks and functions perfectly on all devices - from desktop computers to smartphones and tablets.
faq.q6: What is included in your web development packages?
faq.a6: Our packages typically include: responsive design, SEO optimization, security implementation, performance optimization, basic training, and documentation. We offer custom packages tailored to your specific needs and budget.
faq.a7: Yes, we offer reliable hosting solutions with 99.9% uptime guarantee, SSL certificates, regular backups, and security monitoring. We can also help you migrate existing websites to our hosting environment.
faq.q8: Can you redesign my existing website?
faq.a8: Certainly! We specialize in website redesigns that improve user experience, modernize the design, enhance performance, and boost conversion rates while maintaining your brand identity.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy Policy for Lemgenda Web Development. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in compliance with GDPR.
privacy.content:
1. Information We Collect

We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

  • Name and contact information (email, phone number)
  • Company information
  • Project requirements and specifications
  • Communication records
  • Website usage data through cookies

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide and maintain our services
  • Process your requests and projects
  • Send technical notices and support messages
  • Respond to your comments and questions
  • Improve our website and services
  • Send marketing communications (with your consent)

3. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share information with:

  • Service providers who assist in our operations
  • Professional advisors (lawyers, accountants)
  • Law enforcement when required by law

4. Data Retention

We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

5. Your Rights Under GDPR

Under GDPR, you have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate data
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Restrict or object to processing
  • Data portability
  • Withdraw consent

6. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

7. Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.

8. International Data Transfers

Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

9. Children's Privacy

Our services are not directed to individuals under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

10. Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

11. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions, contact us at:

Email: lemgenda.obrt@gmail.com
Phone: +385 95 383 1325

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms of Service for Lemgenda Web Development. Learn about our service agreements, project terms, and client responsibilities.
terms.content:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Lemgenda's services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

2. Services Provided

Lemgenda provides web development, SEO optimization, logo design, and IT services as described on our website.

3. Project Terms

  • All projects require a signed agreement
  • Payment terms are specified in individual project contracts
  • Client is responsible for providing necessary materials and feedback in a timely manner
  • Project timelines are estimates and may vary based on client responsiveness

4. Intellectual Property

Upon full payment, clients receive full ownership of the delivered work, excluding third-party components.

5. Payment Terms

  • 50% deposit required to begin work
  • Balance due upon project completion
  • Late payments may incur interest charges

6. Confidentiality

Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of proprietary information.

7. Limitation of Liability

Lemgenda's liability is limited to the amount paid for services.

8. Termination

Either party may terminate services with written notice.

9. Governing Law

These terms are governed by the laws of Croatia.

10. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of changes.

11. Contact Information

Lemgenda
Ulica Jurja Križanića 6
44000 Sisak, Croatia
Email: lemgenda.obrt@gmail.com
Phone: +385 95 383 1325

webRazvoj.heroSubtitle: Your website is the first and often the only thing customers will see. Whether it leaves a good impression depends on how it displays on their device. A responsive website ensures your offer always looks neat and professional.
webRazvoj.introductionText1: If your page is not responsive, you risk losing visitors in just a few seconds, because no one likes to zoom and scroll the page left-right to read content. Therefore, responsive design is not an option, but a basic standard for any serious online presence.
webRazvoj.introductionText2: Our web development packages ensure your website is fully adaptable to all devices - from desktop computers to mobile phones. We use a mobile-first approach that ensures optimal user experience regardless of screen size.
webRazvoj.benefit1Desc: We first design for mobile devices, then adapt for larger screens
webRazvoj.benefit2Desc: Optimized pages that load quickly on all devices
webRazvoj.benefit3Desc: Responsive design is a ranking factor in Google search
webRazvoj.benefit4Desc: Prepared for new devices and technologies to come
webRazvoj.packagesSubtitle: Choose the package that best suits your needs and budget
webRazvoj.tinyWebDescription: Who is tinyWeb for? Ideal solution for small businesses, freelancers, services and anyone who needs a professional, modern and fast website without unnecessary complexity.
webRazvoj.tinyWebAdvantage1: Quick to develop and even faster to load
webRazvoj.tinyWebAdvantage3: Has everything needed for professional online presence
webRazvoj.midWebDescription: Who is midWeb for? MidWeb is a solution for users who need a bilingual presentation website with enhanced design, better SEO and additional features.
webRazvoj.midWebAdvantage3: Can be expanded later to CMS
webRazvoj.proWebDescription: Who is proWeb for? proWeb is a premium solution for those who want maximum flexibility and a website ready for serious marketing. Contains CMS, SEO, blog and a full set of advanced features of choice.
webRazvoj.proWebAdvantage1: Modern CMS - user edits content themselves
webRazvoj.tinyWebSpec1: Single page (Single Page Application - SPA style)
webRazvoj.tinyWebSpec7: Footer: logo, slogan, service links, data
webRazvoj.midWebSpec2: 4-6 subpages (About, Services, Contact, Blog landing, References...)
webRazvoj.copywritingDesc: Professional writing of texts for your website
webRazvoj.contentDesc: Professional content placement on the page
webRazvoj.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a free consultation and a quote tailored to your needs.
webRazvoj.blogPostsDesc: Regular writing and publishing of high-quality blog posts
webRazvoj.customAnimationsDesc: Custom animations and micro-interactions to enhance user experience
webRazvoj.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about Web Development
webRazvoj.faq1Question: Which package is best for my business?
webRazvoj.faq1Answer: tinyWeb - ideal for freelancers and small businesses needing a simple presentation website, midWeb - perfect for companies needing multiple pages and better SEO, proWeb - for those who want content control through CMS, enterpriseWeb - complete custom solution for large companies
webRazvoj.faq2Question: Is maintenance included in the price?
webRazvoj.faq2Answer: All packages include basic setup and testing. For regular maintenance, we offer special maintenance packages that include security updates, backups, and technical support.
webRazvoj.faq3Question: Can you take over an existing website?
webRazvoj.faq3Answer: Yes, we offer migration services for existing websites to new technologies with improved performance and security.
webRazvoj.faq4Question: How long does enterpriseWeb package development take?
webRazvoj.faq4Answer: The enterpriseWeb package requires 15-30 working days depending on project complexity. This timeframe includes detailed planning, development, testing, and implementation.
webRazvoj.faq5Answer: No. We do not provide hosting services. However, we can recommend reliable hosting providers and assist with setup and configuration.
webRazvoj.faq6Answer: For the enterpriseWeb package, we offer flexible payment options, including installment payments. For other packages, 50% upfront and 50% upon completion is available.
webRazvoj.processSubtitle: Our structured approach ensures your website is perfectly tailored to your needs
webRazvoj.step1Desc: We discuss your goals, audience, and requirements to understand your vision and needs.
webRazvoj.step2Desc: We create wireframes and design concepts that reflect your brand and user experience.
webRazvoj.step3Desc: We transform the design into a functional website using the latest technologies and best practices.
webRazvoj.step4Desc: We thoroughly test the website on different devices and browsers and optimize performance.
webRazvoj.step5Desc: We launch your website and provide continuous support to maximize your online success.
webRazvoj.processCtaSubtitle: Let's start the conversation about your website today!
webRazvoj.enterpriseWebDescription: Who is enterpriseWeb for? EnterpriseWeb is a complete custom solution for companies and organizations that need comprehensive, scalable and high-quality digital space with complete customization, advanced functionalities and expert support.
webRazvoj.enterpriseWebAdvantage2: Highest level of performance and security
webRazvoj.enterpriseWebAdvantage4: Ready for major changes and high traffic
webRazvoj.enterpriseWebSpec4: Advanced CMS with custom fields and modules

ecommerceRazvoj.heroSubtitle: Your web shop page is the virtual storefront of your business. Whether visitors become customers depends on how your store displays and functions on their device. A modern e-commerce system ensures your offer always looks professional and is easily accessible.
ecommerceRazvoj.introductionTitle: Why is E-commerce Crucial for Your Business?
ecommerceRazvoj.introductionText1: If your website doesn't have e-commerce functionality, you're losing potential customers 24/7. Modern consumers expect online shopping capability, fast delivery and easy payment methods. E-commerce is not a luxury, but a basic standard for any serious online sales.
ecommerceRazvoj.introductionText2: Our e-commerce packages ensure your web shop page is fully functional, secure and adaptable to all devices - from desktop computers to mobile phones. We use a mobile-first approach that ensures optimal user experience regardless of screen size.
ecommerceRazvoj.benefit1Desc: We design first for mobile devices, then adapt for larger screens
ecommerceRazvoj.benefit2Desc: Integration of secure payment methods to protect customers and your business
ecommerceRazvoj.benefit3Desc: Advanced tools for tracking sales and customer behavior
ecommerceRazvoj.benefit4Desc: Systems for tracking delivery and managing inventory
ecommerceRazvoj.processTitle: Process of Creating Your Web Shop
ecommerceRazvoj.processSubtitle: Our structured approach ensures your web shop page is perfectly tailored to your needs
ecommerceRazvoj.step1Desc: We discuss your products, target audience and requirements to understand your vision and needs.
ecommerceRazvoj.step2Desc: We create wireframes and design concepts that reflect your brand and optimize user experience for shopping.
ecommerceRazvoj.step3Desc: We transform the design into a functional web shop page using the latest e-commerce technologies and best practices.
ecommerceRazvoj.step4Desc: We thoroughly test the shop on different devices and browsers and optimize performance and security.
ecommerceRazvoj.step5Desc: We launch your web shop page and provide continuous support to maximize your online sales.
ecommerceRazvoj.processCtaTitle: Ready to start your e-commerce project?
ecommerceRazvoj.processCtaSubtitle: Let's start the conversation about your web shop page today!
ecommerceRazvoj.packagesSubtitle: Choose the package that best suits your needs and budget
ecommerceRazvoj.miniDropshipDescription: Who is miniDropship for? Ideal solution for small businesses, beginners in online sales and everyone who wants to start an e-commerce site with basic functionalities at an affordable price. Perfect for market testing or selling limited assortment.
ecommerceRazvoj.standardShopDescription: Who is standardShop for? Perfect for growing brands and companies that want a more serious online presence with advanced functionalities, better user experience and improved conversions.
ecommerceRazvoj.proShopDescription: Who is proShop for? Premium solution for serious sellers who need a complete e-commerce system with advanced functionalities, custom design and integrations ready for growth.
ecommerceRazvoj.wordpressShopDescription: Who is wordpressShop for? Ideal solution for companies that want a combination of simple WordPress CMS and complete e-commerce functionality. Perfect for those planning to independently manage content and products.
ecommerceRazvoj.productEntryDesc: Professional product placement on your web shop page
ecommerceRazvoj.seoDesc: Improving product visibility in search engines
ecommerceRazvoj.emailMarketingDesc: Setting up email automations for abandoned carts
ecommerceRazvoj.analyticsDesc: Setting up systems for tracking sales and customer behavior
ecommerceRazvoj.discountsDesc: Setting up discount systems and promo codes
ecommerceRazvoj.shippingDesc: Connecting with delivery services and tracking systems
ecommerceRazvoj.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about E-commerce Development
ecommerceRazvoj.faq1Question: Which e-commerce package is best for my business?
ecommerceRazvoj.faq1Answer: miniDropship - ideal for beginners with up to 10 products, standardShop - perfect for growing companies with up to 200 products, proShop - for serious sellers with unlimited number of products, wordpressShop - for those who want a combination of WordPress CMS and e-commerce
ecommerceRazvoj.faq2Question: Is maintenance included in the price?
ecommerceRazvoj.faq2Answer: All packages include basic setup and testing. The wordpressShop package includes 6 months of technical support. For regular maintenance we offer special maintenance packages that include security updates, backup and technical support.
ecommerceRazvoj.faq3Question: Can you take over an existing web shop?
ecommerceRazvoj.faq3Answer: Yes, we offer migration services for existing web shops to new technologies with improved performance, security and modern functionalities.
ecommerceRazvoj.faq4Question: How long does proShop package development take?
ecommerceRazvoj.faq4Answer: The proShop package requires 18 working days depending on project complexity. This timeframe includes detailed planning, custom design, development, testing and implementation.
ecommerceRazvoj.faq5Question: Do you offer hosting setup services?
ecommerceRazvoj.faq5Answer: We do not offer hosting services, but we provide technical support for setting up your web shop page on hosting of your choice. We recommend reliable hosting providers optimized for e-commerce.
ecommerceRazvoj.faq6Answer: For the proShop package we offer flexible payment options, including payment in installments. For other packages, payment of 50% upfront, 50% upon completion is available.

ecommerceRazvoj.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a free consultation and quote tailored to your e-commerce needs.

ecommerceRazvoj.proShopSpec5: Advanced discount system and loyalty program

seo.metaTitle: Lemgenda - SEO Optimization and Google Positioning | Sisak, Croatia
seo.metaDescription: Professional SEO optimization and Google positioning in Sisak, Croatia. Improve your website visibility in search results.
seo.metaKeywords: seo optimization, search engine optimization, google positioning, google optimization, ranking improvement, seo services, Sisak, Croatia
seo.heroSubtitle: Your website is invisible if Google can't find it. SEO optimization is crucial for increasing your business visibility in search results. Without quality SEO, your website remains hidden from potential clients.
seo.introductionTitle: Why is SEO Optimization Crucial for Your Business?
seo.introductionText1: If your website isn't optimized for search engines, you're losing 90% of potential clients who search for your services on Google. SEO is not a luxury, but a basic standard for any serious online presence.
seo.introductionText2: Our SEO services ensure your website is visible, relevant and competitive in search results. We combine technical optimization, quality content and strategic monitoring to achieve lasting results.
seo.benefit1Desc: Increase visitor numbers without paying for advertising
seo.benefit2Desc: Attract visitors who actively search for your services
seo.benefit3Desc: SEO results last long after the initial investment
seo.servicesSubtitle: Choose services that best suit your needs and budget
seo.oneTimeServicesDesc: These services are the foundation of your SEO. They are the initial steps that will make your website recognizable and attractive to search engines.
seo.monthlyServicesDesc: SEO is not a one-time project, but a continuous process. These services ensure your progress lasts and you compete in the long run.
seo.technicalAuditDescription: Detailed diagnostics of your website where we check technical errors that prevent search engines from properly indexing and ranking it.
seo.technicalAuditWhyNeed: Because the best content in the world is useless if Google can't find and understand it. It's like a building foundation - without it, everything you build is unstable.
seo.technicalAuditWithoutIt: Your website may have 'invisible' errors that block better ranking. You could spend money on advertising and content while your SEO progress remains slow or non-existent.
seo.onpageDescription: Optimization of individual pages to make them relevant for specific keywords and attractive to users.
seo.onpageWhyNeed: To tell Google and your visitors what each individual page is about and why it's worth their attention.
seo.onpageWithoutIt: Your pages will be generic and difficult to compete for specific terms. Like having products in a store without labels.
seo.schemaDescription: Adding special code to your page that gives Google additional, structured information about your content.
seo.schemaBenefit1: Possibility of appearing in Rich Snippets
seo.schemaWhyNeed: To stand out in the sea of competition. Rich results attract more attention and look more reliable than regular links.
seo.schemaWithoutIt: You'll miss the opportunity to make your listing in search results more prominent and attractive.
seo.speedDescription: Speeding up your website loading time on all devices, especially mobile.
seo.speedWhyNeed: Because people are impatient. A slow website drives away visitors, reduces sales and harms your SEO.
seo.speedWithoutIt: High bounce rate, loss of potential clients and lower ranking on Google.
seo.basicMonitoringDescription: Regular monitoring of key SEO indicators: keyword positions, technical errors and basic traffic.
seo.basicMonitoringWhyNeed: So you don't 'drive blind'. Without monitoring, you don't know if your strategy works, if you're losing ranking or having page problems.
seo.basicMonitoringWithoutIt: You'll work in the dark. You won't know if your SEO is successful, and problems will only be discovered when it's too late.
seo.advancedMonitoringDescription: Comprehensive analysis including basic monitoring, plus in-depth competitor analysis and identification of new growth opportunities.
seo.advancedMonitoringWhyNeed: To stay one step ahead of competition. This is a proactive approach that ensures continuous growth.
seo.advancedMonitoringWithoutIt: You'll remain at basic level. You'll miss important expansion opportunities.
seo.contentDescription: Systematic updating and improvement of existing content to keep it fresh, relevant and competitive in search results.
seo.contentWhyNeed: Because Google loves fresh and relevant content. Old, neglected articles lose ranking.
seo.contentWithoutIt: Your existing content will slowly lose its power and ranking. New articles from your competitors will overtake you.
seo.linkBuildingDescription: Strategic acquisition of quality external links from other websites to yours. This is one of the strongest ranking factors.
seo.linkBuildingWhyNeed: To build authority and trust in your brand. Without external links, Google considers you 'unknown'.
seo.linkBuildingWithoutIt: Your SEO progress will be very slow, especially in competitive niches. You'll be limited to less competitive terms.
seo.withoutItTitle: What if I don't have this?
seo.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about SEO Optimization
seo.faq1Question: How long does it take to see SEO optimization results?
seo.faq1Answer: You can see first results within 2-4 weeks for technical fixes. For significant position improvements on competitive keywords, 3-6 months of continuous work is needed. SEO is a marathon, not a sprint.
seo.faq2Question: What's the difference between one-time and monthly SEO services?
seo.faq2Answer: One-time services fix your SEO foundations (technical audit, speed optimization). Monthly services maintain and build on those foundations through continuous monitoring, content optimization and link building.
seo.faq3Question: Can you improve SEO for existing websites?
seo.faq3Answer: Yes, we specialize in optimizing existing websites. We start with technical audit to identify problems, then work on on-page optimization and continuous improvement.
seo.faq4Question: Is combination of one-time and monthly services possible?
seo.faq4Answer: Absolutely! The best results are achieved by combining one-time foundation fixes and continuous work through monthly services. We recommend starting with technical audit, then moving to monthly monitoring.
seo.faq5Question: How many pages should I optimize to start?
seo.faq5Answer: We recommend optimizing 5-10 most important pages (homepage, services, contact) to start. After that you can continue with other pages depending on your goals and budget.
seo.faq6Question: Do you offer guarantees for Google positions?
seo.faq6Answer: We don't offer guarantees for specific positions because Google continuously changes its algorithms. However, we guarantee professional work according to best SEO practices and regular reporting on achieved progress.
seo.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a free SEO analysis and quote tailored to your needs.

sem.heroSubtitle: Increase your brand visibility through targeted advertising and strategic social media presence. Our marketing campaigns deliver measurable results.
sem.introductionText1: In today's digital age, your brand's online presence is not just an option - it's a necessity. Through targeted SEM advertising and strategic social media presence, you can reach your ideal audience at the right time and place.
sem.introductionText2: Our marketing packages ensure your brand is visible, recognizable, and engaging. We combine analytical approach with creative solutions to achieve maximum return on investment.
sem.benefit1Desc: Reach your ideal audience with precisely set up campaigns
sem.benefit2Desc: Track campaign performance in real-time and optimize ROI
sem.benefit3Desc: Create a loyal community around your brand through engaging content
sem.semPackagesSubtitle: Targeted Google Ads advertising for maximum ROI
sem.semBasicDescription: Ideal for businesses just starting with Google Ads. We provide basic campaign setup that will attract first relevant visitors to your website.
sem.semBasicFeature1: Google Ads setup: Complete configuration of Google Ads account and conversion tracking
sem.semBasicFeature2: Basic campaigns: Creation and launch of one key campaign
sem.semBasicFeature3: 1 landing page: Creation of simple conversion-optimized landing page
sem.semAdvancedDescription: For businesses ready for more advanced strategies that want to achieve better results through multiple channels and improve conversion rate.
sem.semAdvancedFeature2: Remarketing: Setting up campaigns to re-engage visitors
sem.semAdvancedFeature3: Display ads: Creation of visually appealing ads
sem.semAdvancedFeature4: Shopping ads (e-commerce): Specific setup for webshops
sem.semAdvancedFeature5: CRO analysis: Basic analysis for conversion rate improvement
sem.semTopDescription: Complete SEM management for maximizing return on investment (ROI). Focused on continuous improvement and growth through testing and automation.
sem.semTopFeature2: Campaign scaling: Systematic expansion of successful campaigns
sem.semTopFeature3: A/B testing: Continuous testing of ads and landing pages
sem.semTopFeature4: Automations: Implementation of advanced bidding rules
sem.semTopFeature5: Google Tag Manager - advanced rules: Complex interaction tracking
sem.socialPackagesSubtitle: Monthly management of social media presence for brand building
sem.marketingBasicDescription: Maintaining social media presence for businesses whose main goal is regular posting and engagement with existing audience.
sem.marketingBasicFeature1: Basic social posting: Posting on 2 platforms of your choice
sem.marketingBasicFeature2: 4 posts monthly: One post per week
sem.marketingBasicFeature3: Simple visuals: Creation of clean and neat graphic posts
sem.marketingAdvancedDescription: Complete package for growth on social media, including more creative design, video content and strategic approach.
sem.marketingAdvancedFeature1: 8 posts monthly: Two posts per week
sem.marketingAdvancedFeature2: Template design: Creation of unique graphic templates
sem.marketingAdvancedFeature3: Instagram Reels: Creation and posting of one video reel monthly
sem.marketingAdvancedFeature4: Copywriting: Writing persuasive and creative captions
sem.marketingTopDescription: Premium strategic approach for brands wanting leading position on social media, including professional video production and analytical overview.
sem.marketingTopFeature2: Professional design: High-quality graphic design of all posts
sem.marketingTopFeature3: Video production: Up to two professional video contents monthly
sem.marketingTopFeature4: Growth analysis + strategy: Monthly performance report
sem.copywritingSubtitle: Professional writing for web, blog and social media
sem.basicCopywritingDesc: Functional, SEO-optimized texts for web and blog
sem.landingPageDesc: Sales-oriented text tailored to your audience with clear call-to-action
sem.aboutSectionDesc: Story that builds trust and humanizes your brand
sem.blog500Desc: Informative and interesting article for attracting organic traffic
sem.blog1000Desc: Comprehensive, detailed article positioning you as an expert
sem.metaDesc: Short, attractive descriptions improving CTR in search results
sem.proCopywritingDesc: Strategic writing focused on brand building, emotional connection and direct conversion
sem.brandStoryDesc: Fundamental narrative story of your brand that emotionally resonates with audience
sem.productCatalogDesc: Descriptions that not only explain but also sell, highlighting unique values
sem.emailSequenceDesc: Series of 3-5 personalized emails guiding users through sales funnel
sem.socialMediaDesc: Creative and engaging captions for social media that raise brand awareness
sem.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about SEM and Marketing
sem.faq1Question: What budget do I need for SEM advertising?
sem.faq1Answer: Recommended starting budget for SEM campaigns is 200-500 € monthly, depending on competition in your industry. The budget is paid directly to the advertising platform and is not part of our fee.
sem.faq2Question: Which social media platforms do you recommend?
sem.faq2Answer: Platform selection depends on your target audience. B2B companies more often use LinkedIn, while B2C has better results on Facebook and Instagram. We analyze your audience and recommend optimal platforms.
sem.faq3Question: How long until I see results?
sem.faq3Answer: SEM campaigns deliver results within few days, while building social media presence requires 3-6 months of continuous work for significant results.
sem.faq4Question: Can you take over existing campaigns?
sem.faq4Answer: Yes, we offer takeover and optimization services for existing SEM campaigns and social media. We analyze current performance and implement improvements.
sem.faq5Answer: All packages include basic performance tracking. SEM Top and Marketing Top packages include detailed monthly reports with analysis and improvement recommendations.
sem.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for free consultation and analysis of your marketing potential.

odrzavanje.title: MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
odrzavanje.subtitle: Monthly maintenance packages for your website
odrzavanje.basicDescription: Suitable for smaller websites without frequent changes.
odrzavanje.standardDescription: For serious business websites that need stability.
odrzavanje.premiumDescription: Package for clients who value quick response and proactive maintenance.
odrzavanje.enterpriseDescription: For large systems, ecommerce or business-critical websites.
odrzavanje.premiumFeature3: Advanced speed optimization (Core Web Vitals, server tuning)
odrzavanje.premiumFeature5: 2 hours of development or content changes monthly

logoDesign.heroSubtitle: We create unique visual identity that will make your brand recognizable. From logos to complete graphic solutions for web and social media.
logoDesign.introductionText1: Logo is the heart of your brand identity - the first thing people notice and remember about your company. A well-designed logo communicates professionalism, reliability and your brand values.
logoDesign.introductionText2: Our approach combines creativity with functionality, ensuring your logo not only looks great but works great in all contexts - from website to print materials.
logoDesign.benefit1Desc: Unique design that stands out from competition
logoDesign.benefit3Desc: Logo that works on all platforms and media
logoDesign.servicesSubtitle: Complete graphic services for your brand
logoDesign.logoDesignDesc: Creation of completely new logo: several conceptual ideas, revisions, color and black-white versions, delivery in vector (e.g. SVG, EPS) and raster formats (PNG, JPG).
logoDesign.vectorizationDesc: Converting existing low-quality logo into vector format; scalability without quality loss, optimized for print and digital.
logoDesign.webBannerDesc: Banner design for web: visual adapted to banner size, optimization for fast loading, delivery in JPG / PNG format.
logoDesign.facebookProfileDesc: Simple visual identity design for profile (logo, graphic elements), delivery optimized for social networks.
logoDesign.facebookCoverDesc: Visual for Facebook profile/page cover: adapted dimensions, graphics reflecting the brand, possible illustrations or photos.
logoDesign.socialPostDesc: Statistical visual, post with illustration, branded graphics: depending on complexity (simple design - lower range, more complex design/illustration - higher range).
logoDesign.videoPostDesc: Short animation (motion graphics) for social media. Duration e.g. up to 15-30 seconds, optimized for social platforms (e.g. MP4 format).
logoDesign.introAnimationDesc: Animated intro (logo reveal) - logo animation, effects (fade, scale, rotations), optimized for video formats (e.g. MP4), duration e.g. up to 5-10 seconds.
logoDesign.processSubtitle: How creating your logo looks in practice
logoDesign.step1Desc: We discuss your brand, target audience, values and competition to understand your vision.
logoDesign.step2Desc: We create several conceptual sketches and ideas based on your brief.
logoDesign.step3Desc: We transform the selected concept into digital design with precision and attention to detail.
logoDesign.step4Desc: We take your feedback and perfect the design until you are completely satisfied.
logoDesign.step5Desc: We deliver final files in all necessary formats for web, print and social media.
logoDesign.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions About Logo Design
logoDesign.faq1Question: How long does the logo design process take?
logoDesign.faq1Answer: Standard logo design process takes 7-14 working days, depending on project complexity and number of revisions. Includes consultations, concepts, development and final delivery.
logoDesign.faq2Question: What is included in the logo price?
logoDesign.faq2Answer: Price includes: several conceptual sketches, 2-3 revisions, color and black-white versions, and delivery in vector (SVG, EPS, AI) and raster formats (PNG, JPG) of various sizes.
logoDesign.faq3Question: What is vector format and why is it important?
logoDesign.faq3Answer: Vector format (like SVG or EPS) allows infinite scaling without quality loss. This is crucial for print materials, large formats and future logo size changes.
logoDesign.faq4Question: Can you work from my sketches or ideas?
logoDesign.faq4Answer: Absolutely! Your sketches and ideas are a great starting point. We combine your vision with our expert knowledge to create professional and effective design.
logoDesign.faq5Question: Do you offer complete brand identity packages?
logoDesign.faq5Answer: Yes, besides individual services, we also offer complete brand identity packages that include logo, colors, typography, guidelines and usage examples on different media.
logoDesign.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for free consultation and quote tailored to your needs.

accessibility.heroSubtitle: Make your website accessible to everyone. WCAG AA and AAA optimization for people with disabilities, screen reader compatibility and full keyboard compatibility.
accessibility.introductionText1: Over a billion people worldwide live with some form of disability. An accessible website is not only a legal requirement in many cases, but also expands your audience and improves user experience for all visitors.
accessibility.introductionText2: WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) are the global standard for web accessibility. Our packages ensure your site meets these standards and is available to everyone.
accessibility.benefit1Desc: Accessibility for people with different disabilities
accessibility.benefit3Desc: Accessible sites rank better in search engines
accessibility.packagesSubtitle: Choose the accessibility level that fits your needs
accessibility.aaPackageDescription: Adaptation of existing website according to WCAG AA standards. Ideal for most business websites, portals, institutions and crafts.
accessibility.aaaPackageDescription: Advanced adaptation for maximum accessibility. For institutions, government bodies and projects where accessibility is mandatory.
accessibility.aaFeature1: Manual testing according to WCAG AA guidelines
accessibility.aaFeature5: Check of all forms and error messages
accessibility.aaFeature6: Testing with basic screen readers (NVDA or VoiceOver)
accessibility.aaFeature16: Validation with automatic and manual tools
accessibility.aaFeature17: Delivery of 'Accessibility Statement' for AA level
accessibility.aaaFeature3: Simplified content for harder to understand elements
accessibility.aaaFeature5: Greater user control (pausing animations, bypass links)
accessibility.aaaFeature6: More accessible forms with advanced feedback
accessibility.aaaFeature10: Testing with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
accessibility.additionalServicesSubtitle: Optional services for maintaining and improving accessibility
accessibility.service1Desc: Regular accessibility check to ensure continuous compliance
accessibility.service2Desc: Continuous monitoring and maintenance of your site's accessibility
accessibility.service3Desc: Ensuring accessibility of new content during migration
accessibility.service5Desc: Real user experience testing with people with disabilities
accessibility.faq1Question: What's the difference between WCAG AA and AAA?
accessibility.faq1Answer: WCAG AA is the medium accessibility level that covers the most important requirements for most users with disabilities. AAA is the highest level that ensures maximum accessibility, but can be harder to achieve for some types of content. AA is usually sufficient for most commercial websites.
accessibility.faq2Question: Is accessibility legally required in Croatia?
accessibility.faq2Answer: Yes, according to the Electronic Communications Act, all public websites in Croatia must be accessible. This especially applies to government institutions, local administration and public services. Private companies should also consider accessibility to avoid potential legal issues.
accessibility.faq3Question: How long does the accessibility optimization process take?
accessibility.faq3Answer: WCAG AA package usually takes 2-4 weeks, depending on website size and complexity. WCAG AAA package can take 4-8 weeks due to more extensive testing and implementation of advanced requirements.
accessibility.faq4Question: Can you optimize existing websites or only create new ones?
accessibility.faq4Answer: We optimize both existing and new websites. For existing sites we do detailed audit and implement necessary fixes. We can also ensure that new websites are accessible from the very beginning of development.
accessibility.faq5Question: Do you offer accessibility education for our team?
accessibility.faq5Answer: Yes, we offer educational workshops and training on web accessibility for your development and content team. This helps ensure that future content and changes are accessible from the start.
accessibility.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a free accessibility assessment of your site and a quote tailored to your needs.
